0540/A0/05/006/001.status_value: 2 Lessons learned. In 2016  a study on Lessons Learned from the UNICEF Brazil TSSC agenda was finalized  which will help inform ongoing discussions around the UNICEF SSC strategy globally as well as the CPD process of UNICEF Brazil. That piece of research was based on interviews with Government counterparts and UNICEF colleagues of other countries as well as in Brazil.
